name: The Core
description: The central ring of the station, housing the Nexus and the seat of power.

name: The Horizon
description: The outermost ring, known for its stunning views of the cosmos and its adventurous inhabitants.

name: The Meridian
description: The middle ring, a hub of commerce, entertainment, and social interaction.

name: The Genesis
description: The ring responsible for food production, agriculture, and environmental sustainability.

name: The Crucible
description: The ring focused on industrial manufacturing, resource processing, and technological development.
